title: Lexington Dip Recipe
full_text:
Lexington Dip Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Cook
15 mins
Active
20 mins
Cooling Time
30 mins
Total
45 mins
Serves
20 servings
Makes
2 1/2 cups
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
cups
cider vinegar
1/2
cup
water
1/2
cup
ketchup
1
tablespoon
dark brown sugar
1
teaspoon
black pepper
1
teaspoon
crushed red pepper
1
teaspoon
kosher salt
1/2
teaspoon
cayenne pepper
Directions
Combine all ingredients in a medium sauce pan. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat, allow to cool to room temperature. Pour into jar and store in refrigerator.
Dipping Sauce
Stovetop
